Package index

Data access

gho_get()
Low-level GET for WHO GHO OData
gho_find_indicator()
Search GHO indicator metadata by keyword
gho_get_indicator()
Download all data for an indicator code
get_coverage()
Get vaccination coverage series
get_cases()
Get reported cases series
get_demography()
Get demography series
vpdsus_cache_info()
Cache information

Panel and susceptibility

build_panel()
Build a country-year panel
estimate_susceptible_static()
Method A: static coverage-based susceptibility
estimate_susceptible_cohort()
Method B: cohort reconstruction using births + coverage
estimate_susceptible_cohort_ve()
Method C: cohort reconstruction with two doses + vaccine efficacy
estimate_susceptible_case_balance()
Method D: susceptible balance updated using cases

Risk and plotting

risk_rank()
Compute risk categories and ranking tables
plot_coverage_rank()
WHO-style coverage ranking plot
plot_susceptible_rank()
WHO-style susceptible ranking plot
plot_panel_diagnostics()
Panel missingness diagnostic plot
panel_diagnostics()
Extract join diagnostics from a panel

Modelling

make_outcome_outbreak()
Make outbreak outcome variables from cases
make_modelling_panel()
Create lagged modelling panel
fit_outbreak_models()
Fit baseline outbreak models
evaluate_models()
Time-aware model evaluation (simple split)

Mechanistic (optional)

odin2_balance_inputs_from_panel()
Build susceptible-balance inputs from a panel
odin2_build_model()
Compile an odin2 template
odin2_inputs_from_tibble()
Build odin2 input vectors from a year-keyed tibble
odin2_simulate()
Simulate an odin2 model
compare_methods()
Compare susceptibility trajectories across methods

Calibration

calibrate_rho_case_balance()
Calibrate rho for the case-balance susceptible recurrence

Datasets and helpers

vpdsus_example_panel()
Example panel shipped with the package
vpd_panel vpd_panel-class
A joined country-year panel for VPD susceptibility
vpd_indicators()
Built-in mapping of common indicators
vpdsus-package vpdsus
vpdsus: VPD susceptibility estimation and risk scanning
